    Okta's Recent Customer Support Data Breach Impacted 134 Customers
    Identity and authentication management provider Okta on Friday disclosed that therecent support case management system breachaffected 134 of its 18,400 customers. It further noted that the unauthorized intruder gained access to its systems from September 28 to October 17, 2023, and ultimately accessed HAR files containing session tokens that could be used for session hijacking attacks. "The
    Google Play Store Introduces 'Independent Security Review' Badge for Apps
    Google is rolling out an "Independent security review" badge in the Play Store'sData safety sectionfor Android apps that have undergone a Mobile Application Security Assessment (MASA) audit. "We've launched this banner beginning with VPN apps due to the sensitive and significant amount of user data these apps handle," Nataliya Stanetsky of the Android Security and Privacy Teamsaid.

    Cyber threats on satellite technology will persist and evolve. We need a comprehensive cybersecurity framework to protect them from attackers.  ( 51 min )
